snippet: With an average audience of 1.5 million viewers - in the daytime hours - archery had a bigger audience than any other sport NBC has covered on its cable channels, including basketball.
abstract: With an average audience of 1.5 million viewers - in the daytime hours - archery had a bigger audience than any other sport NBC has covered on its cable channels, including basketball.

headline.main: Archery Draws a Big TV Audience: Could 'Hunger Games' Be the Reason?
